lvl1: Introduction to Cypress. This 1-hour presentation gives an introduction to the Cypress Test Runner, its architecture, and the problems it is solving. We will cover end-to-end testing, accessing the application’s internal state, component testing, API testing, visual testing, and collecting code coverage from tests. We will also look at network stubbing and the trade-offs between the full stubbing and spying on the network traffic. The presentation will be followed by questions and answers. Video at https://commited.tech/events/session-introduction-to-cypress/
